devdoc.details: This contract tracks shares in a sigmoid bonding curve per Taker NFT. When users spend reactions against a Taker NFT, it will use the Curator Liability to buy curator shares against that Taker NFT and allocate to various parties. The curator shares will be priced via the sigmoid curve.  The params that control the shape of the sigmoid are set in the parameter manager. At any point in time the owners of the curator shares can sell them back to the bonding curve.

CuratorSharesBought(uint256,uint256,addr.details: Event triggered when curator shares are purchased

CuratorSharesSold(uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Event triggered when curator shares are sold

buyCuratorShares(uint256,address,uint256.details: Buy curator shares when reactions are spent. The reaction vault is the only account allowed to call this.

returns._0: Returns the amount of curator shares purchased.

calculatePaymentReturnedFromShares(int25.details: Selling shares into the curve will return payment tokens to be refunded

params.currentSharesSupply: current amount of shares in the curve
params.paymentReserves: current mount of payment reserves in the curve
params.sharesToSell: amount the of shares the user wants to sell

calculateSharesBoughtFromPayment(int256,.details: Buying into the curve with payment tokens will return shares amount to be bought

params.currentSharesSupply: current amount of shares in the curve
params.paymentReserves: current mount of payment reserves in the curve
params.paymentToSpend: amount the of payment tokens to buy shares with

getTokenId(uint256,address,uint256,addre.details: get a unique token ID for a given nft address and nft ID

initialize(address,address).details: initializer to call after deployment, can only be called once

sellCuratorShares(uint256,address,uint25.details: Sell curator shares back into the bonding curve. Any holder who owns shares can sell them back

returns._0: Returns the amount of payment tokens received for the curator shares.

devdoc.title: SigmoidCuratorVault
